org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore

Class AcidEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.MetaStoreEventListener
      • org.apache.hadoop.hive.metastore.AcidEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

    public class AcidEventListener
extends MetaStoreEventListener
    It handles cleanup of dropped partition/table/database in ACID related metastore tables
